titleStmt.title: Theanthropos: or, God made man. A tract proving the nativity of our Saviour to be on the 25. of December. / By John Selden, that eminently-learned antiquary, late of the Inner-Temple.
titleStmt.author: Selden, John, 1584-1654.
Chantry, John, d. 1662?, engraver.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.G. for Nathaniel Brooks at the Angel in Corn-hill.,

notesStmt.note: First word of title in Greek characters.
The portrait of the author is signed: I: Chantry: scu.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
